page.title: 04SHOPS
page.content: There are eight shops in Mendlesham a bakery, post office, whole food shop, florist and green grocers in one, a hair dressers, general grocers and sweet shop in one. We also have a butchers and a garage. The bakery is self service it sells bread and sweets and general provisions and they bake on the premises. The post office is a sub post office which is a very small one and it sells food and stationary and wool, sweets, drinks and other things. The post office shop is self service. The whole food shop has recently opened. It sells nuts raisins and whole food. Whole food is food without sugar and additives. It isnt self service. The green grocers is called Fruit and Things. It is a shop which sells pet food, fruit, vegetables and flowers. You can arrange to send
